translation.en: Our target is wearing a captain's uniform. I repeat, a person in a captain's uniform.
translation.fr:
La cible porte l'uniforme du capitaine.
Je répète : l'uniforme du capitaine.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Bravo!
Come with me, Captain.
Let's go find our table. The show's about to start.
Goddamn! That is bright. I can't see anything in there.
translation.fr: La vache ! Ça m'éblouit, j'y vois rien.

translation.en: [grunts] Yeah. It's like looking straight into the sun.
What the hell is he up to in there? I bet something nuclear.
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce qu'il prépare ?
Je le sens très mal.

translation.en: Remove your night-vision goggles. I repeat, remove the night-vision goggles.
translation.fr:
Retirez vos lunettes à vision nocturne.
Je répète : retirez vos lunettes.

translation.en: This better work, Mr. Know-It-All Vision Expert.
translation.fr:
Et si ça change rien,
monsieur l'opticien ?

translation.en: Okay, fine.
-Set your tasers for max electrocution. -[device chirps] Let's take this asshole down hard.
Hold on a sec. Wait, wait! There are multiple captains in there.
[chief on radio] Decoys.
Ugh, so devious. Go, go, go!
Pacify the captains! Our target could be any one of them. No! No! Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.fr:
Maîtrisez les capitaines,
notre cible est parmi eux.

translation.en: [chief] Son of a bitch!
But they're just kids!
This is no time to categorize or pigeonhole people, Agent Steel.
translation.fr:
On n'est pas là pour les étiqueter,
agent Steel.

translation.en: Tase them all.
[agent] That's what you get for being a decoy.
translation.fr: Voilà ce qu'on leur fait, aux leurres.

translation.en: -[agent 2] Do not move! Do not move! -[screams]
Well, well, well. [chuckles]
What have we got here?
I am Captain Tucker, and I am in charge of this vessel.
translation.fr:
Je suis le Capt Tucker,
je dirige ce navire.

translation.en: What on earth are you doing here? -I demand answers! -Oh…
translation.fr: J'exige de savoir ce que vous voulez.

translation.en: -[groans] -You'll get your answers all right.
You'll get your answers
in a jail cell.
Well, uh, actually, we should probably read him his rights
translation.fr:
En fait, on devrait
l'informer de ses droits

translation.en: and inform him of the charges against him.
translation.fr: et des charges qui pèsent sur lui.

translation.en: And all that.
Oh, nice, Steel. That was a cool-ass line. Way to ruin the moment.
translation.fr:
Merci, Steel.
Ça casse pas du tout mon style.

translation.en: You wanna do that cool line again, Chief?
Nope, nope, nope. The moment is gone.
Steel took that away from us.
Everyone, just… Let's just leave. Let's go.
Hello, sir. They got him.
translation.fr: Oui, monsieur ? Ils l'arrêtent, une fois de plus.

translation.en: It's on again.
translation.fr: Ils l'arrêtent, une fois de plus.

translation.en: [Captain Tucker] This is scandalous! Agh!
[reporter] It was just after midnight
police raided the Pacific Pearl and arrested Captain Herman Tucker
translation.fr:
Le raid du Pacific Pearl a conduit
à l'arrestation du Capt Herman Tucker

translation.en: on multiple charges of drug smuggling,
trafficking, possession of illegal firearms,
translation.fr:
contrebande,
détention illégale d'armes à feu

translation.en: and slaughter of endangered animals.
-[student] Watch out. Pee incoming. -Ugh!
That's a good one.
Yeah, looks like I peed my pants pretty massively.
translation.fr:
On dirait
que je me suis vidangé sur mon fute.

translation.en: Whatever, Fall.
[sighs] Yep, just emptied my bladder in my pants.
translation.fr: Eh oui, je me suis uriné dessus.

translation.en: That's me. No, that's… It's good stuff. See you at the next, uh… Yeah. [clears throat]
translation.fr:
C'est tout moi, ça. C'était bien trouvé.
À plus tard au…

translation.en: The prosecution is getting ready for the trial of the century.
translation.fr:
Le ministère public se prépare
au procès du siècle.

translation.en: But first, Captain Tucker is going to be isolated in prison,
translation.fr:
D'ici là, le Capt Tucker
sera placé en isolement,

translation.en: where should he for some reason pass away,
the district attorney would lose her only witness.
translation.fr: la procureure perdrait son unique témoin.

translation.en: Oh, it looks like I peed myself, but, um…
translation.fr: Je me suis pas pissé dessus,

translation.en: I'm just the butt of a great prank. Don't worry.
-Oh… kay. -Yeah, it's not urine.
-Mm. -Oh, it's actually… It's actually Fanta.
translation.fr: Non, c'est… du soda à l'orange.

translation.en: Whatever, Fall. Exam results are in. You should check 'em out.
translation.fr:
Tais-toi, Fall.
Les résultats sont affichés, va voir.

translation.en: They're here? Should I be excited or--
translation.fr: C'est vrai ? Je vais sauter de joie ?

translation.en: [sarcastically] Oh yeah. This is it.
This is the exam that decides your career, and you really stand out.
translation.fr:
Tu sors vraiment du lot,
ta carrière est toute tracée.

translation.en: Really? Oh! [panting]
Okay. Here we go.
Fall, Fall. Duh-duh-duh…
Ah, darn it.
[agent] Right…
Guys. Wow, I am just so proud right now.
translation.fr:
Les gars, si vous saviez
comme je suis fier de vous.

translation.en: We have helped rid the world of evil.
translation.fr: On a mis un monstre sous les verrous.

translation.en: -Let's have some cake. -Fuck, yeah! Cake tastes good.
translation.fr:
- Prenez du gâteau.
- Putain, j'adore ça.

translation.en: Yeah, I just have this weird hunch. Am I the only one who thinks
translation.fr:
J'ai une intuition bizarre. Personne d'autre pense
qu'on devrait creuser ?

translation.en: there could be more to this Captain Tucker case?
translation.fr:
Personne d'autre pense
qu'on devrait creuser ?

translation.en: Say what, Steel?
I just mean that… does everyone really believe
that one man single-handedly did all those horrible things by himself
translation.fr:
qu'il a commis toutes ces atrocités
sans aucun complice

translation.en: without anyone else on that ship knowing?
translation.fr: ni éveiller de soupçons à bord ?

translation.en: Wow.
Right?
[chuckles] Just wow.
Could be a criminal organization running that ship.
Captain Tucker could actually just be the tip of the iceberg.
translation.fr: Tucker n'est que le premier à tomber.

translation.en: Some kind of pawn. A patsy, a fall guy.
translation.fr: C'est un pion, un bouc émissaire.

translation.en: -You know what I think, Steel? -No.
I think it's actually time for you to shut your big yapper.
translation.fr:
Je crois que vous feriez mieux
de la boucler.

translation.en: -Right on! -Can't you just enjoy this glorious win?
Washington has been this close to shutting us down,
translation.fr:
Washington a bien failli
annuler l'opération,

translation.en: and now you come here with this… this nonsense.
translation.fr: et vous remettez une couche de conneries ?

translation.en: Yeah, what an asshole!
Fuck you, Steel! Fuck you to hell!
translation.fr: Va te faire mettre par Satan.

translation.en: To be completely honest with you, Steel, no one likes a snoopy agent.
translation.fr:
Je vous le dis franchement,
personne n'aime les fouineurs.

translation.en: Really?
All that sneaking around, gathering evidence,
translation.fr:
Fourrer son nez partout
à la recherche de preuves,

translation.en: retrieving lost documents, and finding witnesses
translation.fr: de documents perdus et de témoins

translation.en: that could shed new light on a case?
Ugh. People hate that.
-But that's kind of our job though. -Our job was to crack this case.
translation.fr: C'est notre boulot. On avait une affaire à résoudre

translation.en: -And now it's cracked. -[phone vibrating]
Yes?
Mm. Unfortunate? [chuckles]
Roger that.
Listen up, team.
Captain Tucker just killed himself in jail.
translation.fr:
Le Capt Tucker s'est ôté la vie
dans sa cellule.

translation.en: Suicide, Epstein-style.
What?
It's probably because he was torn apart by guilt.
translation.fr: La culpabilité aura eu raison de lui.

translation.en: So the train has left the station. Case closed forever.
In your face, Steel.
[chief] Oh! Yes. Oh. Let's go!
♪ Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it ♪
Hey, what are you doing with, uh, that evidence?
You heard the chief. Case is closed. We're burning everything.
translation.fr:
T'as entendu le chef, affaire classée.
On brûle tout.

translation.en: Yeah, just dumping it into the evidence destroyer downstairs.
translation.fr:
Je dois tout balancer
dans la machine au sous-sol.

translation.en: Let me take that down for you.
I'm actually heading down to the evidence destroyer right now.
Great. Thanks. Uh, just don't take it home. -That's a federal offense, you know. -Ha-ha!
translation.fr:
Cool, merci. Que ça sorte pas d'ici, OK ?
Ce serait un délit fédéral.

translation.en: I know. I would never do that because that is not what I am going to do.
translation.fr:
Je sais. Je ferais jamais ça.
D'ailleurs, je vais pas le faire.

translation.en: -Far from it. -Great. Good to hear.
This will not be that one case I couldn't let go of
translation.fr: Je ne m'accrocherai pas à cette affaire

translation.en: and eventually get totally Carrie Mathison-obsessed with.
translation.fr:
jusqu'à l'obsession,
à la Carrie Mathison.

translation.en: Perfect.
No way, no, sir. Ain't happening. Not this guy.
translation.fr:
Jamais de la vie.
Fais-moi confiance.

translation.en: Too grounded for that stuff.
Hi.
and up next, we have a great tune from one of my favorites.
translation.fr:
CAPT TANNER FALL CAPT BLAKE FALL
CDTE ALEXIS FALL

translation.en: How can I help you, young man?
Oh, hi. Jonathan Fall. I… I called. Um…
translation.fr:
Bonjour. Je suis Jonathan Fall.
Je vous ai appelée.

translation.en: Oh yes. Mr. Fall. Please come in.
Oh, I was just looking at my family on the wall out there.
translation.fr: Je regardais les photos de ma famille.

translation.en: Fall family has been roaming the seas for generations,
translation.fr:
Les Fall parcourent les mers
depuis des générations,

translation.en: so… they expect nothing less from me.
translation.fr:
Les Fall parcourent les mers
depuis des générations, ma carrière était toute choisie.

translation.en: Let's see here. Jonathan Fall.
Ouch.
Okay, well, I know when you look at my grades, it… it doesn't look that great,
translation.fr:
Je sais que mes notes
ne sont pas très encourageantes,

translation.en: but the ocean is in my blood. It's in my genes, I think, so…
translation.fr:
mais j'ai la navigation dans le sang,
dans les gènes, il paraît.

translation.en: Yeah, my… my… my family was practically responsible for the Allies winning World War II,
translation.fr:
Ma famille a permis aux Alliés
de remporter la Seconde Guerre mondiale.

translation.en: so not too… shabby. [chuckles]
The thing is, you had the worst exams in the history of the Naval Academy.
translation.fr:
Vos résultats sont les pires
de l'histoire de votre académie.

translation.en: Right now, the closest you'll ever get to commanding a ship
translation.fr:
À moins de faire le trottoir
sur les docks,

translation.en: is turning tricks at the docks.
Oh, I don't know, I mean…
If there were guarantees that I would eventually command a ship…
translation.fr: si ça peut me mener au poste de capitaine,

translation.en: Just as a starting gig, maybe I--
I am obviously joking, Fall.
Yeah. Of course. [chuckles] Me, a hooker? No, I… I would never. That's, um…
translation.fr:
Évidemment. Moi, faire des passes ?
C'est hors de question.

translation.en: I was just joking too. Just, uh…
two people in an office just crackin' jokes.
Anyway, you were saying?
What I can offer you is an extensive personality test,
translation.fr:
Je vous propose de faire
un test complet de personnalité

translation.en: where you can show potential employers what you're really made of.
Maybe you have some hidden talents
hidden deep, deep down there. Somewhere.
translation.fr: Bien, bien ensevelis. Quelque part. UN CV QUI FAIT MOUSSE

translation.en: There. Done. [chuckles] I'm pretty sure I nailed it.
translation.fr:
C'est bon, j'ai fini.
Je pense que je l'ai bien réussi.

translation.en: Mm, there is nothing to nail. It's a personality test.
translation.fr: On ne réussit pas un test de personnalité.

translation.en: Hold on. I'll get the results in two secs.
Ooh, wow, there are some great ships here.
Could you send my test results to the Emperor of the Seas maybe?
translation.fr:
Vous enverriez mes résultats
à l'Emperor of the Sea ?

translation.en: Is that crazy?
-[computer beeps] -Oh. Oh Lord.
-That good? -No.
But I owe it to your family name to get you something.
translation.fr:
Mais je trouverai bien une place
à l'héritier Fall.

translation.en: Oh! Ah, this could be an opportunity for you to work on that personality
translation.fr:
Avec ce poste,
vous avez une opportunité de briller

translation.en: and get some job experience.
And who knows what could happen down the line, Fall.
translation.fr: Qui sait à quoi ça vous mènera ?

translation.en: Wow, that is awesome.
Thank you. Tha… Thank you so much, ma'am.
That is just a dream come true. Thank you for believing in me.
translation.fr:
Mon rêve devient réalité.
Merci de votre confiance.

translation.en: -[foghorn blares] -[man over PA] Thar she blows!
That's on you, Mrs. Gilroy.
-That beautiful saggy ass distracted me. -[laughs]
translation.fr: Je matais votre cul bien flasque.

translation.en: Oh, never mind. Those things happen.
translation.fr: Ça ne fait rien, c'était un accident.

translation.en: -Hey, Tanner! -[Mrs. Gilroy chuckles]
Can't hear me.
Jonathan, darling.
Hey, Mom.
I didn't know we were having a party. What's the occasion?
translation.fr: On a quelque chose à fêter ?

translation.en: -Oh, it's your brother's big day. -Big day?
translation.fr: C'est pour ton frère. Comment ça ?

translation.en: Yes, we're celebrating Tanner's 33 and a half birthday.
translation.fr: Tanner fête ses 33 ans et demi.

translation.en: I'll… I'll… I'll just get changed, and then I'll join in.
translation.fr:
Cool. Je vais me changer
et je vous rejoins.

translation.en: Yeah, about that. You know what?
How about you just climb up in your treehouse,
translation.fr: Tu n'as qu'à monter dans ta cabane,

translation.en: and we'll bring you some food up there.
Your father and I thought that would be a great idea.
translation.fr: Ton père et moi adorons cette idée.

translation.en: I totally agree. It's… It's just that I would really like to, uh, join the party.
translation.fr:
Moi aussi, mais j'aimerais bien
faire la fête avec vous.

translation.en: Of course, but I think it might be better for you to just skip it.
translation.fr:
Je comprends, mais il vaut mieux
que tu ne sois pas là.

translation.en: -So let's go ahead and do that. -Roger that.
Oh, Angela, you made it!
Hi, Dad.
Here you go. Chow down.
Ooh, thank you. So hungry. Good party?
translation.fr:
Merci, je meurs de faim.
Tu t'éclates ?

translation.en: Oh yeah. So great. So much fun.
Skrillex is DJing later,
and your brother is sparkling like a star down there.
translation.fr: Et ton frère est la star de la soirée.

translation.en: Oh. I bet.
May… Maybe I can come down and join in for a little while?
translation.fr:
Je pourrais descendre
faire la fête quelques minutes,

translation.en: Just say hello to Uncle Herman and them maybe, just to get a little taste of the fun.
translation.fr:
dire bonsoir à l'oncle Herman
et profiter un peu de l'éclate.

translation.en: Well, in an ideal world, it's exactly what you would have done,
translation.fr:
Ce serait tout à fait possible
dans un monde idéal,

translation.en: but we don't want to risk you ruining your brother's big day
translation.fr: mais tu risquerais de gâcher la soirée

translation.en: with your presence.
What? Well, I wouldn't ruin anything.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je ne vais rien gâcher.

translation.en: I'll stay low, have a little friendly chat here and there. Yes?
translation.fr:
Je me ferai pas remarquer,
je ferai que papoter.

translation.en: Nope, not gonna happen.
Oh. Oh. You're taking the ladder?
Oh, it's just a security measure.
Mostly to protect you from people climbing up and disturbing you.
translation.fr: Comme ça, personne ne viendra te déranger.

translation.en: Don't want an old uncle to come up there
translation.fr: Évitons qu'un vieux tonton ne monte

translation.en: and have his way with you or anything like that.
What?
I'm not saying it will happen,
but statistically, every family has a molester in their ranks.
translation.fr:
Statistiquement,
chaque famille a son violeur.

translation.en: Yikes, okay. Um, well, thank you, I guess.
I'll put it back in the morning, I almost promise.
translation.fr:
Je la remettrai demain matin,
ou pas.

translation.en: Oh, that would be great. Okay. Good night, Dad.
translation.fr: Je veux bien. Bonne nuit, papa.

translation.en: Good night… you. [chuckles]
♪ I'm on the catwalk, yeah I'm on a catwalk! ♪
translation.fr:
Sur le podium
Sur le podium

translation.en: [chuckles] Tanner. So talented.
♪ Too sexy for my pants Too sexy for my… ♪
translation.fr:
Trop sexy pour mon fute
Trop sexy…

translation.en: [partygoer] You're the best, Tanner!
[sighs] That's unfortunate.
Of course, Mr. Tyrant.
-Was that him? -Yeah.
He wants us to take a different approach this time.
Instead of finding a captain with certain credentials,
translation.fr: il ne veut plus d'un capitaine respecté,

translation.en: he wants us to find a captain with… none.
Like a wet piece of clay with a license to command a ship.
Yeah, I guess.
Let's get to it.
Muy bien. Vamos.
[Tanner] Yah. Coming through. I know the, uh, captain.
translation.fr: Laissez passer, je connais le capitaine.

translation.en: He's the kids' uncle, so move it. -Hey, say hello to your uncle, kids. -Uncle?
translation.fr:
C'est leur oncle. On se pousse.
Dites bonjour à tonton, les enfants.

translation.en: Just messing with you.
I'm trying to bang their mother, and she made me take them to the park.
translation.fr:
Obligé de les sortir au parc
pour me faire leur mère,

translation.en: -Can you believe that? -What?
translation.fr:
non mais sérieux. - Hein ?
- Qu'est-ce qu'y a ?

translation.en: What, what? If you don't wanna know the truth,
translation.fr:
- Hein ?
- Qu'est-ce qu'y a ? Si ça te plaît pas,

translation.en: stop listening in on other people's conversations.
translation.fr:
arrête d'écouter
les conversations des autres.

translation.en: I think he… Honestly, I think this one's slow.
Here. Why don't you go on the ride? Thank you.
Insane birthday party, huh?
I had, like, six beers. I'm hungover like a mofo.
translation.fr:
J'ai bu six bières,
j'ai une GDB de l'enfer.

translation.en: Yeah, it got totally outta hand.
Fucked three chicks, or hens, or whatever.
translation.fr: Je me suis tapé trois gonzesses.

translation.en: I thought there were mostly senior citizens there last night.
translation.fr: J'ai surtout vu des vieilles dames.

translation.en: What can I say?
I like the taste of raisins just as good as grapes.
translation.fr:
flétrie ou bien ferme,
une figue, ça se refuse pas.

translation.en: Anyway, I can't believe I'm finally 33 and a half.
translation.fr: Bref. Dire que j'ai enfin 33 ans et demi.

translation.en: Wow, time flies when you're doing great and having tons of fun at the same time,
translation.fr:
Ça passe trop vite,
quand tout n'est que fun et réussite,

translation.en: both at work and in private.
Sure… Sure. Yes, I get it.
Hey, what's wrong with this ride? Can't it go any faster?
translation.fr:
C'est naze comme attraction.
C'est trop lent.

translation.en: Well, this is as fast as I am allowed to take this… old lady.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas le droit d'aller plus vite
avec ce bijou.

translation.en: Come on, Tiny J.
You know I'm a real captain, right? I could order you if I wanted to.
translation.fr:
Je suis un vrai capitaine,
suffit que je t'en donne l'ordre.

translation.en: Ah, I… [chuckling] I don't think you could do that.
Oh. Oh, you wanna test me? Do you?
-No. -Do you seriously wanna test me?
-I really don't-- -I hereby commandeer this ship.
God, Jonathan! That was so dangerous!
translation.fr: J'y crois pas, c'était hyper dangereux.

translation.en: [woman] Where's my baby?
[man over PA] Thar she blows!
Okay. Well, okay. And now my clothes are wet.
translation.fr:
De mieux en mieux,
mes fringues sont trempées.

translation.en: Jonathan Fall, you have shown a lack of responsibility,
translation.fr: Jonathan Fall. Vous êtes un irresponsable.

translation.en: and I have no choice but to remove you of your stripe.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas le choix,
je vous retire vos galons.

translation.en: -Please, sir. You can't do this. -[grunts]
-Well, I just did! -[distant sirens wailing]
Darn, that hurts.
Mom?
Dad?
Anyone home?
Mom? Dad?
Hello?
Anyone in here? No. Where are you guys?
translation.fr:
Peut-être là ? Non.
Où vous êtes passés ?

translation.en: -[gasps] What the hell, Jonathan? -Hi.
You know very well what that metronome means.
translation.fr:
Tu sais bien que le métronome
sert à faire l'amour en rythme

translation.en: It's lovemaking at a BPM that makes us come
translation.fr:
Tu sais bien que le métronome
sert à faire l'amour en rythme et à jouir précisément au même moment.

translation.en: at the exact same second.
translation.fr: et à jouir précisément au même moment.

translation.en: Yes, I know. Sorry, I… I know.
Well? What?
[sighs] It's just that I was, uh, demoted at work,
and, um… I was just wondering
translation.fr: alors je me disais que vous pourriez

translation.en: if you could speak to Tanner
about me maybe getting some work experience on his ship.
translation.fr: demander à Tanner de me prendre dans son équipage.

translation.en: -He… He won't listen to me. -On Tanner's ship?
translation.fr: Moi, je peux pas. L'équipage de Tanner ?

translation.en: Is that how you wanna live your life, taking handouts to get what you want?
translation.fr: Tu veux dépendre à vie des faveurs des autres ?

translation.en: Not working for it? I don't think so.
translation.fr: Au lieu de travailler dur ? Tu rêves.

translation.en: -That's not how the Fall family works. -[lube squelches]
No way.
Jonathan, darling.
Yes, Mom?
Why don't you get out of the room so that your father and I can finish?
translation.fr:
Sors d'ici et laisse-nous finir,
ton père et moi.

translation.en: No offense, but your presence is a huge, huge turnoff.
translation.fr:
Je regrette, mais tu es la pire,
la plus grande menace pour notre libido.

translation.en: Yes! Now, get the hell out!
-[metronome clicking] -Jesus. There we go. [grunts softly]
Oh, you're s… Okay, yes. That's… That's my cue. [chuckles]
Okay. We're here.
translation.fr:
CENTRES DE RECRUTEMENT
SEAHORSE INTÉRIM MARINE On y est.

translation.en: Oh, and Liza, try not to attract any attention please.
translation.fr:
S'il te plaît, Liza,
évite de te faire remarquer.

translation.en: -Just quick in and out, hmm? -Sure thing, Pedro.
translation.fr:
- Tu entres et tu sors.
- T'en fais pas, Pedro.

translation.en: You know me. I'll be discreet.
Muy bien.
So what can I do for you?
My employer is looking for a captain for a high-end cruise ship.
translation.fr:
Mon employeur cherche un capitaine
pour une croisière de luxe.

translation.en: Perfect. We have some of the best candidates in the country.
translation.fr:
Ça tombe bien,
nous avons des candidats hors pair.

translation.en: Great. We are an unconventional cruise line,
translation.fr:
Parfait. Ce croisiériste ne se plie pas
aux conventions

translation.en: and we are all about giving everyone a chance.
-Sounds good. -Yes.
So I was hoping we could start at the bottom of your deck and work our way up from there.
translation.fr:
Alors, commençons par les candidats
les moins qualifiés.

translation.en: So you want the worst candidate?
Mm… Maybe.
Well, the very worst candidate is a man by the name of Jonathan Fall.
translation.fr:
Vous ne trouverez pas pire
que ce jeune homme : Jonathan Fall.

translation.en: He was at the bottom of his class,
translation.fr:
Il a fini dernier de sa promo
et il a toutes les qualités

translation.en: and he has all the qualities that you're not looking for in a leader,
translation.fr:
Il a fini dernier de sa promo
et il a toutes les qualités qui ne font pas un bon leader,
comme vous pouvez le voir.

translation.en: as you can see here.
translation.fr:
qui ne font pas un bon leader,
comme vous pouvez le voir.

translation.en: Hmm. Gullibility through the roof,
extremely low on natural authority, alphaness, suspiciousness. Uh!
translation.fr:
ne dégage aucune autorité,
suiveur né, zéro jugeote.

translation.en: -This seems like a great fit. -Really?
translation.fr:
- Voilà l'homme qu'il nous faut.
- Vraiment ?

translation.en: Wow, this is so great to hear.
I'm gonna make a huge deal about this and tell everyone.
translation.fr: Il faut que je le crie sur tous les toits.

translation.en: Hey. Please, please, Mrs. Porter.
Discretion is of immense importance to my employer.
translation.fr: Mon employeur tient à sa discrétion.

translation.en: Are you kidding? I'm already making an Instagram post.
translation.fr:
Vous rêvez !
Je rédige déjà un post sur Instagram.

translation.en: We have over 900,000 followers, so the reach is pretty spectacular.
translation.fr:
On a plus de 900 000 abonnés,
tout le monde le verra.

translation.en: This is bound to go viral,
translation.fr: Ça va forcément faire le buzz.

translation.en: and you and your employer will have your faces all over it.
You know, I'm so sorry, but we can't have that.
translation.fr: Je regrette, mais ce serait désastreux.

translation.en: -Ah! -Sorry. Sorry. Uh, sorry. Sorry.
Shit.
Yeah, so, uh…
Sorry.
And… sorry.
Smooth, Liza. Very smooth.
Well, I'll be cocked.
Darling!
Breakfast is ready!
-For me? -Yes, for you, my little scoundrel.
translation.fr:
- Le mien ?
- Oui, le tien, petit chenapan.

translation.en: Johnny, good God, we've missed you so much.
translation.fr: Johnny, tu nous as terriblement manqué.

translation.en: -Since yesterday? -Yes, since yesterday. Did you sleep okay?
translation.fr:
- Depuis hier ?
- Mais oui. Bien dormi ?

translation.en: Oh… Okay. What? What is going on?
Please, Mom, this is disgusting. Ya… Revolting!
translation.fr: C'est répugnant, maman, ça me révulse !

translation.en: What? I am not allowed to tell my favorite son
translation.fr:
Quoi ? Je ne peux pas dire
à mon fils préféré

translation.en: that I love him and miss him?
translation.fr: que je l'aime et qu'il m'a manqué ?

translation.en: What?! Love and miss Jonathan?
I'm… I'm the favorite son. Dad, tell her.
translation.fr: C'est moi le préféré. Dis-lui, papa.

translation.en: Sorry, Tanner. We don't favor any of our children.
translation.fr:
Désolé, Tanner,
pas de favoritisme avec les enfants.

translation.en: But if I was to choose, which I won't, right now it would be Jonathan.
translation.fr:
Si j'avais un préféré, et j'en ai pas,
ce matin, ce serait Jonathan.

translation.en: [Alexis] Me too. If I had to. If I was pushed into a corner.
translation.fr:
Pareil, si je devais choisir
sous la contrainte.

translation.en: Okay. What kind of bizarre charade is this?
You guys always say that you dread the day he was born,
translation.fr:
Vous avez toujours regretté
d'avoir eu un loser pareil

translation.en: and that he's a loser, and that you hoped for so long
translation.fr:
Vous avez toujours regretté
d'avoir eu un loser pareil et espéré qu'il s'agisse
d'une erreur à l'hôpital,

translation.en: that there was a mix-up at the hospital, and you'd get your real child back.
translation.fr:
et espéré qu'il s'agisse
d'une erreur à l'hôpital, qu'on vous rende votre vrai fils.

translation.en: You always say that.
That's enough, Tanner. Shoo! Shoo!
You received this today from the Caribbean Queen.
translation.fr: Le Caribbean Queen t'a envoyé ça. CAPT JONATHAN FALL

translation.en: You have received a formal job offer
to be a captain!
-Wow. -What? What? We're kidding. We're joking, right? [laughs]
Are we kidding? No? What are… You'll be the worst captain on earth!
translation.fr:
C'est pas une blague ?
Tu seras merdique comme capitaine !

translation.en: I don't get it!
It… It fits pretty great, doesn't it?
translation.fr: Il me va comme un gant, vous trouvez pas ?

translation.en: My beautiful boy, I'm so proud of you.
translation.fr: Mon beau garçon, je suis si fière de toi.

translation.en: Your car is here. Good luck… son.
translation.fr: Ta voiture est là. Bonne chance, fiston.

translation.en: -[triumphant music continues] -Put that silly hand away.
Get in here. Oh yeah.
[gasps] It's happening.
Oh, damn. That's a warm and loving hug.
translation.fr:
C'est ce qui s'appelle
une longue et tendre étreinte.

translation.en: -Your turn, Alexis. -Huh. Oh…
-Go on. You can do this. -Yes, I know how to hug.
translation.fr:
- Tu peux le faire.
- Je sais faire un câlin.

translation.en: -There it is. -[Alexis groans]
-So much love in the room. -[Alexis] Mm.
So much.
Morning, Captain. Let me take that for you.
translation.fr:
Bonjour, capitaine.
Je m'occupe des bagages.

translation.en: Oh, thank you very much. That's, uh, me, Captain. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
C'est très gentil.
Je suis le capitaine.

translation.en: -[Blake] Bye-bye, son! -[Alexis] Bye… -[Blake] Great hug. -[Alexis] …you!
translation.fr:
- Au revoir, fils. Super câlin.
- Au revoir !

translation.en: -Bye, Mom. Bye, Dad. -Bye!
translation.fr:
- Au revoir, maman et papa !
- Au revoir !

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Bye, Consuela. Oh, bye, Tanner.
translation.fr: Au revoir, Consuela ! Au revoir, Tanner !

translation.en: [British man] Very well.
Very well indeed.
-You see that, Bon Jovi? -[cat meows]
That is my new captain.
translation.fr: Je te présente mon nouveau capitaine.

translation.en: The future of our enterprise.
